summary: A lovely Rangers Lodge wich can serve as the players home.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]RANGERS LODGE - A LORE FRIENDLY HOUSE MOD[/size]

[img]http://www.majhost.com/gallery/gekkebek/Random/bannermedium2.jpg[/img]

[size=2][b] About the mod [/b][/size]

While these huge house mods are all fancy and amazing. They are just not for me. I like to keep my Skyrim experience as lore friendly as possible and this nice little player house will do just that! This mod will add a Rangers Lodge close to Whiterun wich can serve as the players house. 

This adds a Rangers Lodge, a \'bathing basement\' and several fellow Rangers to accompany you in the lodge. These Rangers all have custom packages and will walk around making the place feel much more alive. They go out on patrols to keep you and your Lodge safe from any danger.

Ofcourse, no container in this house respawns. So you can safely store your belongings here. If you want to deinstall this mod however, don\'t forget to take them back first!

I\'ve tried to minimize the chance of bugs as much as possible but I cant promise that this file contains none whatsoever. So use this file at your own risk. If you happen to run across a bug, please report it in the comments so I can do whatever I can to fix it!

[img]http://www.majhost.com/gallery/gekkebek/Random/companions.jpg[/img]

[size=2][b]Updates V 1.4[/b][/size]
Changed lightning and ambiance of the inside area to set a better mood. (Yes, again)
Made two of the Rangers followers
Made one Ranger a vendor
Some A.I. Tweaks
Minor Cluttering changes.

[size=2][b]Updates V 1.2[/b][/size]
Added more detail to the outside area, Clutter, Trees and a Tanning Rack for the Rangers to use.
Changed lightning and ambiance of the inside area to set a better mood.

[size=2][b]Upcoming/ideas[/b][/size]
Voicing of the Rangers for a unique Skyrim experience. Perhaps addings some small quests to accompany this.

[size=3][b]If you like this, a comment and endorsement would be really appreciated![/size][/b]
[size=2]Additionaly, if you have any good ideas, dont be afraid to tell me about them in the comments![/size]

[img]http://www.majhost.com/gallery/gekkebek/Random/bannerthing.png[/img]

[size=3][b]This is a video showcasing an older version of the mod, version 1.2 [/size][/b]
[youtube]Jev2d3u6jao[/youtube]
A youtube video showcasing the mod done by the great MrTamarian! Even though he missed out on the basement, it\'s still a great vid and will make it easy for you to see if this mod is just what you need!
author: Back2Murder

files.name: Rangers Lodge V12 - OLD FILE

Added more detail to outside area, trees, clutter and tanning rack.
Changed Ambiant Lightning to set a better mood
